column4: quick question hows the graphics coming along on the desktop ubuntu really would love to use it on ym main pc but I a games lover and like high graphics
I like playign games with high graphics thats all...just wanted to know how games are lookign in the recent ubuntu distros
the Ati cards not so compatable atm are they?
Linux is extremely hit-or-miss on whether the game works at all. The ones I've played with, the games looked like they were on a Windows machine (or better), or simply didn't function
